name: electron-laravel
description: Laravel desktop application using Electron JS

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd www && composer install
scripts.install:dev: npm install && cd www && composer install --dev
scripts.install:prod: npm ci --only=production && cd www && composer install --no-dev --optimize-autoloader
scripts.install:production: npm ci --only=production && cd www && composer install --no-dev --optimize-autoloader --no-interaction
scripts.build:prod: npm run install:production && cd www && php artisan config:cache && php artisan route:cache && php artisan view:cache

author: Fredrik Sundquist
